Headline: #87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.
